requests.name: Look Up a Stored Credit Card
requests.description:
Fetch information about a stored tokenized card.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#look-up-a-stored-credit-card
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>

requests.name: Delete a Stored Credit Card
requests.description:
Delete (most of) the details for a card you stored in the Vault. Some data remains available.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#delete-a-stored-credit-card
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>

requests.name: Store a Credit Card
requests.description:
Securely store a tokenized credit card on PayPal's servers.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#store-a-credit-card
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR TOKEN HERE>
